title: Microsoft's hiring of staff from AI startup Inflection referred for UK merger probe

title: Bank of America tops estimates on better-than-expected investment banking
content: Bank of America disclosed new guidance that net interest income, a key metric for banks, will rise to about $14.5 billion in the fourth quarter of this year.

title: Man who claimed to be inventor of bitcoin referred to UK prosecutors for alleged perjury

title: Money launderers are increasingly turning to crypto to conceal flow of funds, Chainalysis says
